Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: This was a totally fun experience. I went on a Friday night when they have karaoke sponsored by Maximum Comics. Such fun!  It's a total dive bar, but in that way that is just awesome. They have seats around the bar, as well as some hightop tables. There's a small stage, a DJ (or in this case KJ) booth, some room for dancing, pool tables, etc.  They have gaming and will comp drinks. They also have drink specials. They have very little on draft, but lots of bottle options for beer. The bartender was super nice, attentive, and funny.  The bathrooms weren't scary. And there's a free condom dispenser too.  It was a cool crowd - just enough people to be fun. Not too many people to be crowded.  There's also a little place to order food from. The food is super cheap and surprisingly quite tasty. I don't know if the nachos were the best in all of Vegas, but they were darn good and loaded with toppings (and so cheap). They most definitely hit the spot.  In sum, this is a great dive and I had a blast.

Reviews.Author: Jez
Reviews.Content: Somehow I'm currently the Yelp Duke of this place.  What?! HOW??   So it's divey and super casual and that's FIIIINE by me. It's nice to go to a place where the chill and friendly GM will come out and have a drink with you and talk to you about theater.  Or see a drag show.  Or get pulled onstage for Karaoke.    I don't regularly go here (maybe every six months?), but the few times I have, it's been relaxed with a chill crowd and it's exactly what you want.  A good 3AM gimme-a-drink gay bar with no attitude.    (I did a Blue Moon pub crawl and my ONE complaint is that my orange slice in my beer was like, the tiniest sliver. I've had limes bigger, lol!)

Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: They play Beyonce and Hanson what more could you ask for in life. Service is amazing!

Reviews.Author: damon
Reviews.Content: Where do I start?  Yes, after 30 minutes, whether you smoke or not, you WILL smell like a gigantic ashtray when you leave.  Yes, it's a bit trashy and probably the best place to troll for a lunchtime shag.  Yes, they have strippers, and drag queens and karaoke....OH MY!!!!  And, I gotta tell ya', probably the most laid back drunken brawl of a good time that you'll never regret.  FLEX should be a Vegas landmark.  If it's not, make it one now on your own terms.  If you're pretentious and need to be in a smokeless ultra lounge, I would suggest anywhere but here. ( or maybe a procedure to remove the  no fun  stick from your booty.)  So......go to FLEX...NOW!!!!  Get FLIRTY, Get DIRTY, Get KRUNK!!!!  Cuz at the FLEX if you don't.....you don't belong.   Goobah Gahbah ONE OF US!!!!!!   ( I know it's not subtle at all, but i really wanted you to know what it's like there.......if the above makes no sense then look below.)  A gay lounge with full bar and a few pool tables.

Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: Oh my goodness! What a fantastically fun place! Drag Queens and Queens thru out the building! Small, quaint and a bundle of fun! I love gay bars!  I didn't know how Ken would be but I think he had an ok time. I, myself, had a blast. We will be back!

Reviews.Author: Wendi
Reviews.Content: I love this neighborhood bar which i heard is now under new ownership. Make sure you check out the Queens of Las Vegas - the best and most creative drag show I've ever seen. The bartenders were great and everyone was so friendly. I will definitely be back next time I'm in town.

Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: OK, my party visited Flex like 4 years ago now...so this is a retro review of Flex circa 2005/6.  Anyway, we arrived earlier in the evening (9, 10??) with a group of about 7.  Later in the evening, there was drag performers...who were very nice and patient with my quite drunk sister in law.  It never got crowded the entire evening...and the patrons looked like locals who wanted to play lottery at the bar.   Anyway, the drink were moderately priced -- and the staff was adequate.  The place is smaller...with some pool tables.  The  stage  is not really a stage at all, as its located in a small corner of the bar.  Anyway, we enjoyed our stay at Flex for the most part...but we haven't been back, so I don't know what that means :-p

Reviews.Author: Marvin
Reviews.Content: Was visiting from out of town, so called this place to see when their good night was and they said it was Friday, when they have drag show and strippers/dancers.  Called Friday evening to find out time of drag show, and person who answered phone said midnight.  Us 8 visitors arrived at 11:45pm, and by 12:45am, the drag show still hadn't started *and* there were no strippers or dancers anywhere.  Place only had about 20 people, with an empty dancefloor that was about 10' x 10'.  I was embarrassed to have brought my fellow visitors to this place--wish we had gone somewhere else.  The only good thing was no cover and they had 2 pool tables.

Reviews.Author: Devin
Reviews.Content: Sure this place is trashy/trailer park ... but it's fun. and I can't believe no one has had the balls to talk about the private rooms. There are small rooms with curtains where you can go with the strippers for a private show. This is the best part of this bar. I did a private with a Russian stripper. Best lap dance I ever had.

Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Great drink specials, the machines and be a little tight, but play with them and they will loosen up.  :)

Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: I would give it a much higher rating except that they only have one bartender on Saturday nights and he is no good at all IMO. This means you will wait a loooooong time to get a drink and when you do get it it is sloppy and often the wrong thing.

Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: $2.00 Tuesday.  Was a little slow.   Alex was behind the bar-Remembered my name after only meeting him one time.   Great service and great gaming.

Reviews.Author: Meana
Reviews.Content: Joe C is an awesome bartender!!  Here serving drinks even after his shift the relief has not shown up over 3 hrs after his shift. He's making me laugh and serving drinks like a mo Fo!!  He makes this place tolerable!!!!

Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: Amazing! Dont be fooled by the location, it looks  sketchy, but the  What a Drag  show on Saturday night is the best, the drinks are great and love the crowd :-)

Reviews.Author: L.
Reviews.Content: The bar was decent, clearly a great hangout for locals.   I made the mistake of taking a cab out there. If you're going I'd suggest driving, or going in a Vegas where Uber exists. Getting a cab back to the strip is a nightmare.

Reviews.Author: Jonny
Reviews.Content: From the outside this place looks like a pueblo-single-floor-ranch house -gone wrong...about 2007. Upon walking in it quickly becomes evident that dive it is not. Ultra lounge is ain't either. This place is well sized and well laid out for the local queer community. This is a good hometown gay watering hole.  Sure you're in Vegas but if you like to see how the locals roll, then this is a queer staple.   Another Yelp reward spot- upon checking in at Flex, Yelp rewards pop up with a $2 shot of any UV vodka.   Hump day in Vegas doesn't yield a packed house but it's not overwhelming for those who don't do crowds. Two pool tables , double dart boards and strategically placed digital slots built into the bar provide enough to single or multi-player entertainment.  Draft beer choices are limited to 2 - the usual suspects for any gay bar across America (bud light and blue moon). Aging up you drink to the cocktail level opens up double full bars sporting what seems like the entire catalog of UV vodka, 5 rows of Absolut choices along with plenty of other bar hard Liquors.   It's Vegas and smoking inside bars and casinos is still legal. Most local watering holes ( and most casinos) have a constant cloud of cigarette smoke causing those non-smokers to either constantly worry about their clothes or choke while just trying to breathe.  At flex the industrial AC and plenty of ceiling fans keep the air flow going and the spacious layout keeps you from having the very light 2nd hand smoke hard to detect. I'm not saying that one can't tell, it's just not the smokey dive you might expect.   Throughout the venue plenty of tv screens keep you updated on specials and all play the same thing simultaneously so no area of the bar offers a blind spot to the bar info. A vending machine offers standard blend of chips to candy bars to gum. Otherwise if you need to carb up or got the munchies this is not a one stop solution.   The decor is modestly modern without any uber fanciness. Artfully placed color changing lights  and led ribbons add a rainbow effect throughout the space without being overtly  gay  ( the M4M PDA does this just fine).  Lighting is more colorful than helpful for seeing and somehow this dark bar just doesn't seem like a dark boozey place.   The clientele here are real people. No pretension, no drama queens, no lottery winners here.  Dress code is a blend of those who just got off work and those who just put on slippers and walked here.

Reviews.Author: Teddy
Reviews.Content: My last night in Vegas on memorial day weekend I headed here with Tiny (Luke) and had a blast. Charles the bartender who made it clear that he only works Mondays and Tuesdays (he is sooooooooo cute...) treated us with such care that I am planning a trip back in July just to go say hi. Overall drinks were poured generously and the clientele was entertaining. Of course by the time we ordered our 3rd cocktail we were getting close to missing our flight and had to slam it and run back to our hotel to pick up our luggage. Unfortunately I didn't get to see the whole Flex scene but hopefully next time.  Would I go back ....oh hells yeah...

Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Nice neighborhood bar but the staff needs to remember that new patrons walk in. Cater to them to keep these new patrons coming back. Seems a little pretentious and it's a 5 dollar bar. I'll come back only for the $2 draft beer. No one is friendly.

Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Okay, after reading the rest of the reviews, we were obviously there on an  off  night. The place was pretty empty and not much to write home about. However, the service was quick and friendly and the price were pretty damn cheap.   I could see this place being fun on a night when the right crowd is there, we just weren't there on that night.

Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: This was my first time that I went to this bar to celebrate Margarita Sanches's Birthday and it was a great time.  The drinks are strong and cheap but the entertainment was really fun !! I would go back !

Reviews.Author: Cecilia
Reviews.Content: I've been to this place several times in the course of three years. I just went last night with my friends who originally introduced me to the place and it's always a good time. The drag show is definitely a lot of fun! There is a sense of class to this place which I really like too. Drinks are reasonably priced and delicious.

Reviews.Author: Alisa
Reviews.Content: This bar is AMAZING! Great music, amazing people, awesome time. Everyone was so nice. Definitely a new hangout spot for my friends and I. The bartender was awesome and so so sweet .

Reviews.Author: Reuben
Reviews.Content: The reason I'm even giving this place 2 stars instead of 0-1 is because the drag show was pretty entertaining.The Bartenders are amazingly friendly and around 11 they have a $10 well all- you- can-drink-all-night special. Aside from that... WOW!!!  HOLE IN THE WALL in a crusty neighborhood next to a strip mall. I wasn't expecting much after perusing the reviews left on Yelp but I really didn't expect to be walking into a smoke filled nightmare. funny thing was they actually had a VIP section. i'm kind of ranting here but it's because I can't wrap my brain around how horrible the place is. It's like going to a garage party when you were in High school but take away the hot guy you had a crush on and replace him with the 8th year senior that's at all the parties.   oh and i had to do laundry after because EVERYTHING i was wearing smelled like the carpet in the suncoast casino. Someone should turn the ventilation system on.

Reviews.Author: Ife
Reviews.Content: It's pretty nice on the inside. People say this place is a dive bar, but it's not anymore! The inside actually looks nice! I guess it was remodeled, and I think they did a good job.  They have a snazzy stage too! You can either walk up, or come out of curtains along the back. I liked that effect, and it's gives the queens options :)  I guess there used to be strippers here. I saw plenty of high heels and sparkly dresses, but no strippers :-(   The bar was modern looking, almost like it would belong in a steakhouse or some chain restaurant. The only thing that I thought was weird was when I tried to pay with a card, the bartender asked me if that's all I wanted to put on it. When I was like,  ummm, yeah I guess. Why?  He informed me that you can't add the tip after. You had to add it before he rung you up. Ohhhhhh-kaaaay. Thought that was a little weird, but whatever.  They have some pool tables in the back, and a nice, new Touchtunes jukebox as well.

Reviews.Author: Gourmet
Reviews.Content: Despite the name, it's not a gym - it's a gay club that features vocalists, drag revues, go-go boys in cages, and male strippers, all of whom fortunately work out when they're not working here. Two-for-one drinks from 6:00 to 9:00pm nightly.
